job.title: Associate Software Engineer, Full Stack
job.description: ltstronggtltugtJob DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtDepartment EngineeringltbrgtltbrgtReports To VP of EngineeringltbrgtltbrgtYardstik is a new venturebacked software company years of experience in SaaS and helping startups become forever companies Were looking for awesome people to come help us reach new heights and fulfill our missionltbrgtltbrgtHeres the highlevelltbrgtltbrgtYardstik is looking for a talented Full Stack Associate Software Engineer to help build out our platform Your duties will include collaborating with other engineers to implement modern cloud technologies AWS DockerltbrgtltbrgtYou are the right candidate for this role if you have completed training in software engineering and have the skills to hit the ground running You must be a selfstarter who is eager to learn comfortable with uncertainty and can demonstrate knowledge of programming and development practicesltbrgtltbrgtOur technology stack and development processes
